english.segment1: You say you heard every word, but I watched you turn away. Your eyes grew colder than winter. "Love is so intrusive," I thought I heard you say. And laugh so unconvincingly
english.segment2: Famous last words, "I'm not ready yet". "I won't be gone a minute"
english.segment3: Narrow is the road and too high a price to pay. When loneliness is such a sanctuary. Empty are the musings and wasted are the days. When you say you were only waiting
english.segment4: And famous last words, "I'm not ready yet". "I won't be gone a minute" and I won't forget. Famous last words. If tomorrow never comes, will I ever know that I was in love?
english.segment5: I was in love. In love
english.segment6: You say you heard every word, I watched you turn away. You were only waiting
